text:
Hi there.
Layne Sadler from Boston.
• Recently wrote the AIQC framework (<http://aiqc.readthedocs.io|aiqc.readthedocs.io>) to drive adoption of deep learning in open science, and to make deep learning reproducible.
• Career product manager - most recently a biotech in genomics working on national biobanks w pharma.
• Ran the Jupyter 2021 survey.
• Love modeling nature as graph data structures.
Wondering if JuliaComputing is building out product management in Boston?

text: <@UGR3910CQ> thanks for lookin out. hows the prep for juliaCon coming along?

elements.text: thanks for lookin out. hows the prep for juliaCon coming along?

text: Shaping up to to be a great conference thanks to the hard work of all the committee folks!

elements.text: Shaping up to to be a great conference thanks to the hard work of all the committee folks!

text: We’re pretty distributed - hence not hiring by geography. At this point we do not have open positions, but we are likely to have as projects shape up. Let’s stay connected. Do see <https://pumas.ai/>

text: Maybe we’ll see you at CAJUN meetups when they resume!

text: <@U67461GUB> Thanks for sharing - love a good meetup. Just joined the group.
